titles.title: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2013
A bill to make the moratorium on Internet access taxes and multiple and discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce permanent.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/22/2013--Introduced. Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2013 - Amends the Internet Tax Freedom Act to make permanent the ban on state and local taxation of Internet access and on multiple or discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce.
